applicationCategoryGroups.name: (Default)
applicationCategoryGroups.description: How the Form looks before a Category is Selected

tutorialSteps.title: Set your Program's Submission and revenue goals
Configure the deadline dates for Submissions and Judging

instance.name: Invoice Created
instance.description: This email is sent to nominator after Invoice creation
instance.subject: Invoice for {OrganizationName}
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"

{FirstName} {LastName},

Your Invoice is now available. A printable copy is available here {InvoiceUrl}.

{InvoiceLineItems}

{PaymentInformation}

","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Applicant Registration
instance.description: This email is sent to new Applicants
instance.subject: Welcome to {OrganizationName} Awards System
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"Thanks for registering to submit an award at {OrganizationName}. Come back before a submission period closes to by visiting {LoginUrl}.

Use your user name: {Email}
With the password you provided.

If you forgot your password simply go to this site to reset it: {ForgotPasswordUrl}

This message has been automatically generated","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Judge Activation
instance.description: This email is sent to new Judges
instance.subject: Judge Access Granted to {OrganizationName} Awards System
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"You have been granted access to be a Judge at {OrganizationName}.

{JudgeLoginOrActivationDirections}

This message has been automatically generated","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Judge Has New Assignments
instance.description: Notification to Judge when Judge has new assignments
instance.subject: New Assignments to Judge for {SolicitationName}
instance.messageTemplateJson: {"htmlTemplate":"An administrator has assigned you more Submissions to review for {SolicitationName}. {JudgeLoginOrActivationDirections}","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: All Judge Assignments Completed
instance.description: This email is sent to all administrative personnel listed for Program when Judge has completed all assignments
instance.subject: {Email} has Completed All Assignments for {SolicitationName}
instance.messageTemplateJson: {"htmlTemplate":"To review Judge assignments and scores visit the admin portal. Link: {RoundOverviewUrl}","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Submission has been Marked as Disapproved by Admin
instance.description: This email is sent to Applicant when Submission has been disapproved by administrator
instance.subject: {ApplicationName} was not accepted for consideration by {SolicitationName}
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"{FirstName},
Your Submission has not met the eligibility criteria for {SolicitationName}.
{SubmissionDisapprovalReason}","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Submission has been Moved from Pending Approval to Complete by Admin
instance.description: This email is sent to Applicant when Submission has been approved by administrator
instance.subject: {ApplicationName} was accepted for consideration by {SolicitationName}
instance.messageTemplateJson: {"htmlTemplate":"Your Submission has met the basic eligibility criteria and will now be considered for review.","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Submission has been Updated by Applicant
instance.description: Notification to Admin When Applicant Updates Submission
instance.subject: {ApplicationId} for {SolicitationName} has been Updated
instance.messageTemplateJson: {"htmlTemplate":"{ApplicationName} has been updated by the Applicant, Click here: {AdminUrlToSubmission} to view it.","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Update Submission Link
instance.description: This email is sent to Applicant if enter more data to the Submission is allowed
instance.subject: An Administrator has Re-Opened your Application to Add More Information
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"Please use the link below to add more data to the Application {ApplicationName}:
{UpdateSubmissionUrl}.

This message has been automatically generated","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Application has been Scored by Judge
instance.description: This email is sent to Applicant when Submission has been Judged
instance.subject: Feedback Provided for {ApplicationName}

instance.name: Application is Marked as Inappropriate
instance.description: This email is sent to Session organizer when Application has been marked as inappropriate by Session Chair
instance.subject: {ApplicationName} is Flagged for Review

instance.name: Email to Send to Session Chairs
instance.description: This email is sent to new Session Chairs when they have been added by primary Session Chair or Program manager
instance.subject: You have been added as a Session Chair to Help with {SessionName}
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"You have been added by {CurrentUserFirstName} {CurrentUserLastName} to help with a Session for {SolicitationName}.
{SessionChairLoginOrActivationDirections}","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Email to Send to Collaborators
instance.description: This email is sent to new Application Collaborators when they have been added by Applicant
instance.subject: You have been added as a Collaborator to Help with {SolicitationName}
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"You have been added by {CurrentUserFirstName} {CurrentUserLastName} to help with an Application for {SolicitationName}.
{CollaboratorLoginOrActivationDirections}","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}

instance.name: Session Finalized
instance.description: This email is sent when Session is created
instance.subject: Session Received

instance.name: Application has been withdrawn by Applicant from Session
instance.description: This email is sent to Session Chairs when Applicant has withdrawn Application from Session
instance.subject: Application {ApplicationName} has been withdrawn from {SessionName}
instance.messageTemplateJson:
{"htmlTemplate":"This Application has been removed from your Session. Please access the portal and update your Session or request help from the conference administrator. {PublicUrlToSession}

Reason from Applicant: {SubmissionDisapprovalReason}
Applicant Name: {SubmitterFirstName} {SubmitterLastName}
Email of Applicant: {SubmitterEmail}","handlebarsTemplate":{"valueHtml":null,"usedPlaceholders":[]},"renderFromHandlebarsTemplate":false}
